meanings.definition: A circular ornamental design with floral motifs.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful rosaces to decorate the wall.
meanings.sent2: The rosaces on the vase added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The rosaces looked like a colorful flower spinning in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box was a treasure chest of rosaces, each one unique and delicate.
meanings.sent5: The rosaces seemed to bloom like a garden in the center of the room.

meanings.definition: A decorative element resembling a rose.
meanings.sent1: The intricate rosaces on the chair made it look like a throne.
meanings.sent2: She wore a brooch with a beautiful rosaces pinned to her dress.
meanings.sent3: The rosaces on the cake were so realistic, guests thought they were edible flowers.
meanings.sent4: The rosaces in the stained glass window glowed like a field of roses in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The rosaces embroidered on the pillow gave it a touch of romance.

meanings.definition: A circular window with ornamental tracery.
meanings.sent1: The old castle had rosaces that let in beams of sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She gazed out of the rosaces and watched the world go by.
meanings.sent3: The rosaces in the church made the sunlight dance in colorful patterns on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Through the rosaces, she could see the garden outside like a framed painting.
meanings.sent5: The rosaces in the tower gave the room a magical glow.
